Class Round

java.lang.Object
com.pld.agile.model.entity.Round
public class Round extends Object
The Round class represents a round of deliveries managed by a fleet of couriers. It manages the assignment of delivery requests to couriers, computes delivery tours, and tracks the delivery information.

This class handles the core functionality of initializing couriers, loading delivery requests from XML files, computing optimized delivery tours using clustering and routing algorithms, and managing the state of delivery rounds.

Since:
2024-04-27

  • Constructor Details

    • Round

      public Round()

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init(Integer CourierQuantity, Plan plan)
      Initializes the round with the specified number of couriers and a plan.

      This method sets up the couriers based on the provided quantity and assigns the given plan to the round. It clears any existing courier and tour assignments to ensure a fresh start.

      Parameters:
      CourierQuantity - the number of couriers to initialize
      plan - the Plan object containing intersections and sections

    • softReset

      public void softReset()
      Soft resets the round by clearing the K-Means clustering instance and resetting the tour attributions.

      This method allows for re-computation of delivery tours without altering the loaded delivery requests or couriers.

    • getTourAttribution

      public List<DeliveryTour> getTourAttribution()
      Retrieves the list of delivery tours assigned to couriers.

      This method prints the routes of each delivery tour for debugging purposes and returns the current list of tour attributions.

      Returns:
      a List of DeliveryTour objects representing the courier assignments

    • setTourAttribution

      public void setTourAttribution(List<DeliveryTour> tourAttribution)
      Sets the list of delivery tours assigned to couriers.
      Parameters:
      tourAttribution - the List of DeliveryTour objects to be assigned

    • computeRound

      public void computeRound()
      Computes and assigns delivery tours to couriers.

      This method uses a solver to compute the best route for each courier based on the delivery requests. It distributes delivery points among couriers, solves for optimal routes, and assigns the resulting tours to each courier.

    • loadRequests

      public void loadRequests(Object source) throws Exception
      Loads delivery requests from an XML file.

      This method accepts either a file path or a MultipartFile containing the XML data. It parses the XML to extract warehouse and delivery request information and populates the corresponding lists.

      Parameters:
      source - either a file path (String) or a MultipartFile containing the XML data
      Throws:
      Exception - if the file cannot be found or parsed, or if delivery addresses are invalid

    • verifyFileExists

      private File verifyFileExists(String filePath) throws FileNotFoundException
      Verifies if the file at the specified path exists.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the file
      Returns:
      the File object if the file exists
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the file does not exist

    • createTemporaryFile

      private File createTemporaryFile(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file) throws IOException
      Creates a temporary file from the uploaded MultipartFile.
      Parameters:
      file - the MultipartFile containing the XML data
      Returns:
      the created temporary File
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file cannot be created or transferred

    • parseXmlFile

      private Document parseXmlFile(File xmlFile) throws Exception
      Parses an XML file into a Document.
      Parameters:
      xmlFile - the XML file to parse
      Returns:
      the parsed Document object
      Throws:
      Exception - if the XML cannot be parsed

    • loadWarehouse

      private void loadWarehouse(Document document) throws InstanceNotFoundException, NoSuchElementException
      Loads the warehouse information from the XML document.
      Parameters:
      document - the XML document containing the warehouse data
      Throws:
      InstanceNotFoundException - if the warehouse address does not exist in the plan
      NoSuchElementException - if no warehouse is found in the XML

    • loadDeliveryRequests

      private void loadDeliveryRequests(Document document) throws InstanceNotFoundException, NoSuchElementException
      Loads delivery requests from the XML document and adds them to the deliveryRequestList.
      Parameters:
      document - the XML document containing the delivery request data
      Throws:
      InstanceNotFoundException - if any delivery address does not exist in the plan
      NoSuchElementException - if no delivery requests are found in the XML

    • setUpData

      private double[][] setUpData()
      Sets up the data array from the current list of delivery requests.
      Returns:
      a two-dimensional array of doubles representing the coordinates of delivery points

    • getIntersectionGroups

      private ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> getIntersectionGroups(ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> groups)
      Converts cluster groups of delivery point indices into their corresponding intersection IDs.
      Parameters:
      groups - an ArrayList of ArrayList<Integer> where each inner list contains indices of delivery points assigned to a cluster
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of ArrayList<String> containing the intersection IDs for each cluster

    • computeRoundOptimized

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> computeRoundOptimized()
      Computes an optimized delivery round by clustering delivery points and assigning them to couriers.

      This method uses K-Means clustering to group delivery points based on their geographical coordinates and assigns each group to a courier. It then computes the optimal delivery tour for each courier using the Branch and Bound strategy.

      Returns:
      an ArrayList of ArrayList<String> where each inner list contains the intersection IDs assigned to a courier

    • getWarehouse

      public Intersection getWarehouse()
      Retrieves the warehouse intersection for the round.
      Returns:
      the Intersection object representing the warehouse

    • getPlan

      public Plan getPlan()
      Retrieves the plan associated with the round.
      Returns:
      the Plan object containing intersections and sections

    • getCourierList

      public List<Courier> getCourierList()
      Retrieves the list of couriers participating in the round.
      Returns:
      the List of Courier objects

    • getDeliveryRequestList

      public List<DeliveryRequest> getDeliveryRequestList()
      Retrieves the list of delivery requests for the round.
      Returns:
      the List of DeliveryRequest objects

    • getDeliveryIntersectionsList

      public List<String> getDeliveryIntersectionsList()
      Retrieves the list of intersection IDs for all delivery requests.
      Returns:
      a List of String containing intersection IDs

    • clearDeliveryRequests

      public void clearDeliveryRequests()
      Clears all delivery requests from the round.

    • getDeliveryRequestById

      public DeliveryRequest getDeliveryRequestById(String deliveryRequestId)
      Retrieves a delivery request by its intersection ID.
      Parameters:
      deliveryRequestId - the ID of the delivery request to retrieve
      Returns:
      the DeliveryRequest object if found, otherwise null

    • deleteDeliveryRequest

      public boolean deleteDeliveryRequest(String deliveryRequestId)
      Deletes a delivery request by its intersection ID.
      Parameters:
      deliveryRequestId - the ID of the delivery request to delete
      Returns:
      true if the delivery request was successfully deleted, false otherwise

    • addDeliveryIntersection

      public DeliveryRequest addDeliveryIntersection(String intersectionId)
      Adds a delivery request for the specified intersection ID.

      This method creates a new DeliveryRequest associated with the given intersection and adds it to the delivery request list.

      Parameters:
      intersectionId - the unique identifier of the intersection to add as a delivery point
      Returns:
      the newly created DeliveryRequest associated with the intersection, or null if the intersection ID is not found in the plan's intersection map

    • ComputeNewRound

      private List<DeliveryTour> ComputeNewRound(Integer courierIndex, Integer intersectionIndex, int mode)
      Computes a new round by updating the delivery tour for a specified courier.

      This method updates the delivery tour by adding or deleting an intersection point based on the mode. It recalculates the optimal route for the courier and updates the tour attributions accordingly.

      Parameters:
      courierIndex - the index of the courier in the courierList
      intersectionIndex - the index of the intersection to add or delete
      mode - the operation mode: -1 to delete the intersection, 1 to add
      Returns:
      a List of updated DeliveryTour objects
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the courier index or intersection index is invalid, or if attempting to delete a non-existent intersection
      IllegalStateException - if the solver for the courier is not initialized

    • updateLocalPoint

      public List<DeliveryTour> updateLocalPoint(Integer courierIndex, String intersectionId, int mode)
      Updates the delivery tour for a specified courier by adding or deleting an intersection point.

      This method recalculates the delivery tour for the specified courier by adding or removing a delivery point. It updates the tour attributions to reflect the changes.

      Parameters:
      courierIndex - the index of the courier in the courierList
      intersectionId - the ID of the intersection to add or delete
      mode - the operation mode: -1 to delete the intersection, 1 to add
      Returns:
      a List of updated DeliveryTour objects
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the courier index is invalid
      IllegalStateException - if an error occurs during the update process

    • generateTourReport

      public String generateTourReport()
      Generates a report of the current delivery tours and saves it to a text file.

      The report includes details such as courier IDs, their assigned delivery points, arrival and departure times, and routes taken. The generated report is returned as a String.

      Returns:
      a String containing the formatted delivery tours report

    • defineWarehousePoint

      public Intersection defineWarehousePoint(String intersectionId)
      Defines the warehouse location by setting it to the specified intersection ID.

      This method updates the warehouse location for the round. If the provided intersection ID does not exist in the plan's intersection map, the method returns null.

      Parameters:
      intersectionId - the unique identifier of the intersection to set as warehouse
      Returns:
      the Intersection object representing the new warehouse, or null if the intersection ID is invalid

    • deleteWarehouse

      public void deleteWarehouse()
      Deletes the current warehouse location.

      This method removes the warehouse assignment from the round by setting it to null.

    • getIsOptimalList

      public List<Boolean> getIsOptimalList()
      Retrieves the list indicating whether each courier's delivery tour is optimal.
      Returns:
      a List of Boolean values where each element corresponds to a courier's tour optimization status
